Hernan tiene 27 años de edad, es soltero, vive en el distrito de Buenos Aires, provincia de Morropón en la región de Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila y los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la crianza y comercio de ganado, además de la agricultura.

El se dedica a la venta de fruta, con más de 3 años de experiencia en el negocio. Cuenta con clientela fija en la zona y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de frutas para su negocio, con esto Hernan espera aumentar el stock de productos que ofrecerá a sus clientes, satisfaciendo así sus gustos y necesidades, lo cual se verá reflejado en su nivel de ingresos, aumentando también su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Hernan is 27, single, and lives in the Buenos Aires district of the Morropon province, which lies in the Puira region in northern coastal Peru. 

Life is quiet in the community and its inhabitants mainly work in livestock breeding and agriculture. 

Hernan makes a living selling fruit and has more than 3 years' of experience in the business. He has a loyal client base as well as very good personal and work references. 

He will use the loan to buy a greater variety of fruit for his business. He hopes that by offering his clients a greater variety of products, he will better satisfy their tastes and needs, which will increase his profit and, in turn, his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of fruit for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to divide up rooms in his home, which will give his children privacy and comfort.

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.en:
Nasiba was born in 1986. She is married and has two children. Her husband works as a builder. They live in a village.

Nasiba is a hardworking woman. She earns a livelihood from farming and foraging for livestock. Since this is hard work, Nasiba also sells her ready-made products at rural fairs and at the market. Nasiba is trying to expand her business and is requesting financial support to buy livestock.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Auténtica Amistad. Group

texts.es: Auténtica amistad es un grupo solidario integrado por tres mujeres laboriosas, que se unieron con el fin de solicitar en ADIM el financiamiento para sus negocios y así aumentar su capital de trabajo. Quien lo coordina es Anabell un mujer de 26 años de edad, acompañada, que comercializa ropa nueva en su comunidad desde hace dos años, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de mercadería de ropa como es Jeans Kalúa, Jean Big Time, blusas, camisetas, short, licras, talladores, etc. El resto de las integrantes son las señoras, Blanca de 42 años de edad comerciante de ropa interior y calzado, y María Magdalena de 38 años de edad, quien vende ropa y elabora costuras desde hace diez años.
texts.en: Auténtica Amistad is a united group with three hardworking woman who came together in the hopes of applying for loans for their businesses from ADIM and increasing their working capital. 26-year-old Anabell is the coordinator. She is married. She has sold new clothing in her community for two years. The loan in the buy clothing merchandise like Kalúa Jeans, Big Time Jeans, blouses, t-shirts, shorts, spandex, bras, etc. The other members are 42-year-old Blanca, who sells underwear and bras, and 38-year-old María Magdalena, who has sold clothes and made garments for 10 years.

loans.use: to buy clothing, which will diversify the products that she offers.

loans.name: Thắm

texts.en:
Mrs. Thắm has a service business providing karaoke services. She has been involved in this business for four years. 

Thắm is 30 years old, and she is married with two children. This is Thắm's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. 

Her biggest problem is the lack of a hygienic latrine. She is applying for a loan to purchase sand, bricks, and cement to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Thắm hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids. She also wants her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, bricks, and cement to build a toilet.

loans.name: Mai

texts.en:
Mrs. Mai operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Mai is 40 years old, and she is married with two children. She lives with two dependents in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2011, Mai joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Mai has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Mai faces in her life is not having a hygeinic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet.

In the future, Mai hopes to maintain a successful business, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Joselito

texts.en:
Joselito is a fish vendor from Concepcion, Iloilo. He is married and has three children. Joselito has been in the fish vending business for more than three years now. He also makes money through his cycle rickshaw.
Joselito is asking for a loan to buy more fish to sell.to his customers.
In the future, Joselito hopes of making his business a success.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Thành

texts.en:
Thành works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle.

Thành is 42 years old and is married with two children.
Thành supports his family with his business in Nong Cong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Thành joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve his business. Thành has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.
Thành has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main hardship that Thành faces in his life is not having a hygienic latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet and bathroom.

In the future, Thành hopes for his children to find a good job, for his business to do well, and for his family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet and bathroom.

loans.name: Nhung

texts.en:
Nhung works in agriculture, caring for poultry and cattle. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. She is 61 years old and married with 5 children. 

She lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. The main hardship that Nhung faces in her life is not having a latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build a toilet.

This is Nhung's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. In the future, she hopes to maintain a successful business, that her children find good jobs, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick, to build a toilet.

loans.name: Yên

texts.en:
Mrs. Yên has a service business, laying bricks. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. She is 34 years old and she is married with 2 children.

Yên lives in Hau Loc district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province. This is Yên's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Yên faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build a toilet.

In the future, Yên hopes that her children find good jobs, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build a toilet.

loans.name: Adriana Jessenia

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Los Corrales se reúne cada 15 días en una localidad llamada Los Corrales a pocos minutos de Montecristi, en este sitio la mayoría de los habitantes tiene diferentes actividades, tales como: artesanía y comercio en general.
Aquí vive señora Adriana, tiene 27 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos de 13, 9 y 6 años, el mayor estudian  en colegio y los menores en escuela.  El marido es chofer profesional.
Doña Adriana es una mujer que le gusta trabajar para así ganar su  recursos y con estos ayudarle a su marido con los gastos del hogar, ella se dedica al  comercio, vende  ropa de todo tipo y bisuterías, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, sale a ofrecer sus productos tres o cuatro días por semana, ella también los fines de semana  se dedica a preparar y vender  comida en su casa, allí prepara deliciosos platos que son del agrado de sus clientes que siempre llegan  a comer en su local. Lleva 8 años dedicada a estas actividades con lo cual se gana lo suyo  para el bien de su familia.
Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, camisas bisuterías y víveres para preparar los alimentos. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le  gusta porque con uno de los créditos empezó su negocio.  Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
The Los Corrales Credit Group meets every 15 days in an place called Los Corrales, a few minutes from Montecristi; in this area the majority of the inhabitants have different businesses, such as craftwork and general commerce.  

Adriana lives here; she is 27 years old, married, and has three children with her husband who are 13, 9, and 6; the eldest is in high school and the younger ones are in grade school.  Her husband is a professional driver. 

Adriana is a woman who likes to work to earn her income and with that income help her husband with the household expenses.  She works in commerce, selling all kinds of clothing and costume jewelry; she sells door-to-door and she goes out to offer her products three or four days a week.  On the weekends she also makes and sells food in her home; she prepares delicious plates that the customer who always come to eat at her place like.  The has had these businesses for eight years and they allow her to earn on her own to help her family.  

This loan is to buy pants, tops, costume jewelry, and ingredients to make her prepared foods.  She has been with her credit group from the beginning and she likes it because one of the loans started her business.  Her dream is to give her family the best.

loans.use: to buy pants, tops, costume jewelry, and food supplies.

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a hardware business in the Philippines. 

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Letecia is borrowing PHP 35,000 through NWTF in order to buy more stock of hardware to sell.

NWTF is re-listing Letecia's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of hardware to sell.

loans.name: Fahriye

texts.en:
Fahriye is married with four children. She has retired from her job at a cleaning company. Rather than be idle in retirement, she began buying and selling items such as pillowcases and underwear. She doesn’t have to look for customers much, she has certain clients and buys based on orders.

She’ll use the loan to buy items. She wants to continue working as long as she is well enough.


Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Fahriye Hanım evli dört çocuk annesi.  Fahriye Hanım bir temizlik şirketinde çalışarak emekli olmuş.  Emekli olduktan sonra boş durmamak için yedi yıldır nevresimden iç çamaşırına kadar değişik ürünler alıp satıyor.  Çok dolaşmıyor  belirli müşterileri  var ve sipariş üzerine bunlara şatış yapıyor.  Aldığı kredi ile ürün alacak.  Sağlığı ve gücü el verdikçe işine devam etmek istiyor.

loans.use: to buy products

loans.name: Mận

texts.en:
Mrs Mận operates a food stall/restaurant, selling fish. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. She is 51 years old and married with 5 children. They live in Hau Loc district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Mận's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build a toilet.

In the future, Mận hopes for her children to find good jobs, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build toilet.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” COMUZONE III”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Lucila; la socia tiene 56 años de edad tiene 03 hijos y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azúcar, leche entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de gaseosas, leche entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
This is a member of the COMUZONE III Communal Bank; the bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province and department of Cusco.

This bank member is Lucila; she is 56 years old and has three children and she is married.  She alternates her daily activities with her grocery business; she sells different types of products, such as rice, sugar, and milk, among others.  She has had her business for a good while and it is going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.  She wants to keep working to keep supporting her family. 

She is requesting a loan to buy soft drinks and milk, among other things.  

She is thankful for the loan and she promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks and milk, among other things

loans.name: Đào

texts.en:
Mrs. Đào operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Đào is 43 years old, and she is married with 2 children. She lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Đào's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygeinic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Đào hopes to maintain a successful business, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet

loans.name: Benedicta

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” COMUZONE III”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,  perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Benedicta; la socia tiene 62 años de edad tiene 03 hijos y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de sauna, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, la socia trabaja conjuntamente con su esposo, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para realizar el mantenimiento y limpieza de sus maquinas.
La socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
This is a member of the COMUZONE III Communal Bank; the bank is located in the district of Cusco, which is in the province and department of Cusco.  

This is Benedicta; she is 62 years old, has three children, and is married.  She alternated her daily activities with her sauna business.  She has had her business for a good while and it is going well for her because of the effort she puts into it every day.  She works together with her husband; she wants to keep working to keep supporting her family.  

She is requesting a loan to perform maintenance on and to clean her machines.  

She is thankful for the loan and she promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on and to clean her machines

loans.name: Thao

texts.en:
Thao works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle.

Thao is 38 years old and is married with two children.
She lives and works in Quang Xuong district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2014, Thao joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Thao has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.
Thao has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main hardship that Thao faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Thao hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to travel for vacation within the country, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick o build a toilet.

loans.name: Thiêm

texts.en:
Thiêm works in agriculture, raising marine aquaculture.

Thiêm is 52 years old and is married with two children.
Thiêm lives in Hau Loc district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Thiêm's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.
Thiêm has been involved in this business for four years.
The main hardship that Thiêm faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

In the future, Thiêm hopes to build a new house, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Tomasa Requilda

texts.es:
Tomasa Requilda tiene 64 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en el distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La población de este distrito se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, su negocio esta ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio. Tomasa realiza esta actividad desde que se caso para apoyar con los gastos familiares. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de alimentos balanceados para el engorde de sus animales y una segunda parte para arreglar su dormitorio y de esta manera tener un lugar agradable para descansar.
texts.en:
Tomasa Requilda is 64 years old and lives with her husband in the Oyotun district of the Chiclayo province with lies in the northern coastal region of Lambayeque, Peru. 

The inhabitants of the district mainly work in agriculture, commerce and livestock breeding. 

Tomasa makes a living breeding small animals such as hens, ducks, turkeys etc and she runs the business from the back of her house. Tomasa has been working in the field ever since she she got married so that she can help support her family financially. 

She has requested a loan for two purposes. Firstly, she will use it to buy feed to fatten up her animals, and secondly, she will use it to make some improvements to her bedroom so she has a comfortable place to sleep.

loans.use: to buy feed to fatten up her animals.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en: Maricel is 30 years old, married and she lives in Oroquieta. Maricel has a fish-vending business and owns a small fish pond area. She has earned approximately PHP 5,000 each month doing this type of activity for two years. She has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase fishing materials, additional fingerlings, and equipment for her fish pond. She has recently became an active member of PMPC. In the future, Maricel hopes to live a comfortable life and provide her children a good education.

loans.use: to purchase fishing materials, additional fingerlings, and equipment for her fish pond

loans.name: Sally

texts.en:
Sally is 57 years old and married with two children. Sally works very hard to provide for her family.

Sally runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, noodles, sugar, and canned goods.

Sally has been in this business for 10 years. 

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, noodles, sugar, and canned goods

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Thirty-three-year-old Mercy does not boast of a university degree or even a certificate from an agricultural institute, but she is an accomplished farmer from the Kerugoya area of Kenya and commands a lot of respect. 

She is happily married, and together with her handsome husband, they are blessed with 2 children. For the past 10 years she has been involved in mixed farming, and because of the immense knowledge she has in farming, farmers from their village and neighboring villages troop to her home to seek technical advice on the best farming techniques. 

Mercy has identified free space on her farm and wants to fully utilize this space by keeping a good quality dairy cow. Dairy farming in Kenya is a very profitable venture and milk prices in the recent past have been going up. Mercy, being a visionary and entrepreneurial woman, wants to take full advantage of this. She has chosen the breed of cow that she will keep, and she knows that she will not only get milk from the cow but also manure, and this will boost the fertility of her farm. 

Selling her milk will never be a problem because there is a ready market and she will also be selling to big dairy processing firms. Mercy said she chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan because they offer agriculture-based loans, and their interest rate is low and is on a reducing basis. 

She underwent training through Juhudi Kilimo, and from this training she learned that saving is a continuous process in many micro-finance institutions. Mercy hopes that through the accumulated profit she will be able to start adding value to her milk by starting services such as packaging and the production of other dairy products. 

This loan will change her life and will secure the future of her school-going children.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 37 years old and married with one child who is in school. Gemma works very hard to provide for her family.

She runs a bakery in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy additional ingredients for her bakery business.

Gemma has been in this business for 17 years and sells a variety of items. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Gülhayat

texts.en: Gülhayat is married and the mother of two. She has sold Tupperware for eight years. She became regional distributor last month. There are two members working under her. She’ll use the loan to buy products. She says she has achieved everything she has set her mind to in life. She wants to reach women who aren’t working and help them improve their lives by providing them with an income source. She can touch a lot of lives.

loans.use: to buy Tupperware products for resale.

loans.name: Nazli

texts.en:
Nazlı is married and the mother of two children. She began selling Tupperware on the advice of a friend.  Her life has changed a lot since she began doing this work. Her social life developed as she got out more and her self confidence increased. She met a lot of new people.With this loan she will buy kitchen utensils. Her goal is to sell enough to win one of Tupperware’s gifts and trips. She wants to expand the groups under her as well.


Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Nazlı Hanım evli ve iki çocuk annesi.  Bir arkadaşını tavsiyesi ile tupperware satış işine giriyor.  Bu işe başladıktan sonra hayatında çok şey değişmiş.  Evden dışarı dahi çıkamazken bu işle sosyal hayatı gelişmiş,kendine olan özgüveni artmış,bir çok çevreden arkadaş edinmiş.  Aldığı ikinci kredi ile mutfak gereçleri alıp satışını arttıracak.  Hedefi belli bir satış gerçekleştirip  tupperware’n hediyelerinden ve gezilerden yararlanmak.  Alt gruplarını daha da çoğaltmak.

loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils

loans.name: Sevil

texts.en:
Sevil is 54-year-old married woman with three children. Her main source of income is growing pears, peaches, apples, pomegranates and cherries to sell at the local bazaar. Her elder son helps her when they go to the bazaar. 

She has been in this business for 25 years and earns about 130 AZN. This income is not enough for her to cover her family's needs.

In this region people prefer to eat fresh fruits. Sevil needs to buy new fruit trees, seed and fertilizer for her garden. If she realizes her plan, her life will get better. For this reason she requested 1,500 AZN from Kiva. She hopes that lenders will help her.

loans.use: To buy new fruit trees, seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Uyên

texts.en:
Uyên works in agriculture, raising marine aquaculture.

Uyên is 55 years old and is married with four children.
Uyên lives with no dependents in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Uyên's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.
Uyên has been involved in this business for five years.
One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

In the future, Uyên hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Isa

texts.en:
For the last 14 years, Isa has been in the carpentry business earning a monthly income of KES 12,000. He is married to Mildred and they are blessed with three school-going children.

He has applied for his second loan of 22,500 KES from VisionFund Kenya. He intends to use the loan to buy more timber for carpentry work. 

Isa will use the anticipated profits to provide for his family's basic needs. He hopes to grow his business and be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy more timber for carpentry work

loans.name: Norma Elcira

texts.es:
Norma tiene 28 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con su hijo en casa propia de material rústico en la parte rural del distrito de Pucará, en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Las actividades principales que se desarrollan en el distrito son la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza como perfumes, cremas corporales, entre otros, cuenta con más de 3 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Adicionalmente se dedica a brindar servicio de atención al cliente en un restaurante del distrito lo que le genera ingresos adicionales. El destino del crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de productos de belleza para su negocio, con esto Norma espera aumentar el stock de productos de su negocio para poder satisfacer los gustos de sus clientes, lo que se verá reflejado en su nivel de ingresos así como también en su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
28-year-old Norma is a single mother who lives with her son in her own rustic home. She lives in the district of Pucara, province of Jaen, region of Cajamarca, in Peru's northern highland. The main economic activities in the district are agriculture, commerce and cattle raising. 

She works selling beauty products such as perfumes and body creams, among others. She has more than 3 years of experience in the business and has very good personal and work-related references. She also works providing customer service in a restaurant in the district, which generates additional income. The loan will be destined to providing a larger quantity of beauty products for her business. Norma hopes this will allow her to increase the quantity of products in stock at her business, which will allow her to satisfy her customers' tastes. This would be reflected in her income level and in her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of beauty products for her business.

loans.name: Doroteo

texts.es:
Doroteo tiene 56 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos en el distrito de Pomahuaca, provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. El distrito se caracteriza por un clima cálido, las actividades principales son el cultivo de frutales, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, aceite, fideos, entro otros, así como también a la venta de fruta de estación. Adicionalmente brinda servicio de transporte en su mototaxi, trasladando a sus clientes de Pomahuaca a los caseríos aledaños. Cuenta con experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, aceite, entre otros, para aumentar el stock de su tienda. Con esto Doroteo espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes, aumentando así su nivel de ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Doroteo is 56 years old. He lives in the district of Pomahuaca, Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the North Andes of Peru. The area has a hot climate and the principal businesses are growing fruit, raising livestock and commerce.

Doroteo works selling groceries like rice, sugar, oil and pasta amongst others as well as selling seasonal fruit. Currently he also offers motor-taxi service, transporting his clients of Pomahuaca and the neighboring villages. He has experience in this field and has good personal and labor references from the area.

The loan will be used to buy a greater quantity of groceries like rice, sugar and oil amongst others to increase the stock of his store. Doing this Doroteo hopes to offer a greater variety of products to his clients , increasing the level of his income and in the end improving his quality of living and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of groceries like rice, sugar and oil amongst others to increase the store's stock.

loans.name: Idelso

texts.es:
Idelso tiene 39 años, es soltero, vive en la casa de sus padres en el distrito de Pucará, ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en el distrito es tranquila, la población se dedica principalmente a la agricultura y ganadería.

El se dedica a la venta de animales menores (cerdos), cuenta con más de 2 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para su negocio, con esto Idelso espera aumentar su nivel de ventas y por ende sus ingresos, mejorando así su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Idelso is a 39-year old single man who lives with his parents in the district of Pucará, province of Jaén, region of Cajamarca in the north mountains of Perú. Life in that district is peaceful and people mainly work in agriculture and stock breeding. 

He makes a living selling small animals, such as pigs, and has more than 2 years of experience in the business, with very good personal and professional references in the district. He will use the loan to buy more animals for the business, so that he can increase his sales and income. His goal is to improve the quality of life of his family.

loans.use: to buy more animals for his business.

loans.name: Gulbarchyn

texts.ru: Гулбарчын 39 лет, замужем, 6 детей школьного возраста. На протяжении 15 лет Гулбарчын занимается полеводством и животноводством, начав этот бизнес с покупки одного теленка. Благодаря упорному труду Гулбарчын в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 3 коровы, 10 овец и 1 лошадь. На участке мерою 2,66 Га она выращивает ячмень. Ежемесячный доход Гулбарчын составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулбарчын обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку лошади. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота, чтобы накопить средства на постройку нового дома.
texts.en:
Gulbarchyn is 39, married, and has six children in grade school.  For 15 years, Gulbarchyn has been a crop and livestock farmer, having started this business with a purchase of one calf.  Thanks to her persistent efforts, Gulbarchyn currently has three cows, ten sheep and one horse on her farm as well as 2.66 hectares of land for growing barley, and her monthly income is 10,000 som.

To further develop her business, Gulbarchyn has requested a loan of 70,000 som from Bai Tushum Bank to buy a horse.  The extra income she'll earn due to the loan will be used to add more animals to her farm so she can set aside money to build a new house.

loans.use: buy a horse to increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Liliana

texts.es:
Liliana tiene 37 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive en casa propia junto a sus cuatro hijos en el distrito de La Matanza, provincia de Morropón, ubicada en la región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en el distrito es tranquila, sus pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, cuenta con más de 01 año de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en el distrito. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de ropa y otros productos de belleza para su negocio. Con esto Liliana espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes, obteniendo así mayores ingresos que le permitan a un mediano o corto plazo aumentar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Liliana is 37 years old. She lives in her own house with her 4 children in the district of La Matanza, Morropón province, located in the region of Piura, on the North Coast of Peru. Life in the district is quiet and it's people work mainly in agriculture, commerce and raising livestock.

Liliana works selling clothing for women, men and children. She has more than 1 year's experience with this business and has good personal and labor references in the district. The loan will be used to buy a greater quantity of clothing and other beauty products for her business. Doing this Liliana hopes to offer a greater variety of products to her customers, making more income which will permit in the short or medium term for her to improve her quality of living.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of clothing and other beauty products for her business.

loans.name: Leodigario

texts.en:
Leodigario sends you his thanks for your generosity. His previous loan enabled him to buy more fish to sell and helped him to establish his business. The profits helped him to provide for his family’s daily needs.

Leodigario is very positive that a loan of 19,000 PHP will improve his business. The loan will be used to purchase fish. The funds will allow him to improve his business as Leodigario's customers will likely buy more items if he has more products on display. An increase in sales will also result in a significant increase in profit, which will make his business more viable and sustainable. The business profits will be used to sustain the needs of his family.

Leodigario would like to open another branch of his store. Aside from expanding his business, Leodigario wants to buy a house and car. He meets with his *co-fellowship members every week to share stories of his work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Yeyson Maydimi

texts.es: Yeyson es un hombre de 26 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y su hija de 5 años de edad. ÉL es un hombre emprendedor que se esfuerza cada día por salir adelante, apoyado en su negocio de venta de productos básicos, por mayoreo. Yeyson desea adquirir un crédito que le permita construir una galera en su vivienda, ya que actualmente el agua se filtra en ella porque no cuenta con una protección en sus alrededores, es por ello que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para construir una galera alrededor de su vivienda lo antes posible, sobre todo porque actualmente la temporada de lluvias ha finalizado.
texts.en:
Yeyson is a 26-year-old man who resides in his own home along with his life companion and their five-year-old daughter. He is an enterprising man who strives each day to get ahead. His business involves selling basic products at wholesale.

Yeyson wants to acquire a loan so that he can build a shed for his home. The one he currently has allows water to filter through and does not provide protection to the area around his home. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI so that he can invest in galvanized metal sheets, wood, and nails. This will allow him to build a shed for his home as soon as possible, especially at this time when the rainy season has ended.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, and nails in order to build a shed for his home.

loans.name: Liliana

texts.es:
Liliana tiene 40 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive junto a sus dos hijos en el distrito de Buenos Aires, provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila y la población se dedica principalmente a la crianza y comercio de ganado, además de la agricultura.

Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, actividad que realiza desde hace más de 2 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Adicionalmente se dedica a la venta de plátano y a la crianza y venta de aves de corral como gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros. El crédito será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de ropa para aumentar el stock de productos que ofrece en su tienda, con esto Liliana espera satisfacer los gustos de sus clientes, lo que se verá reflejado en un aumento en su nivel de ingresos y por ende en su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Liliana is 40 years old, a single mother, and lives with her two children in the Buenos Aires district of the Morropon province in the Piura region on the north coast of Peru. Life in the community is calm, and the population works mainly in the raising and selling of cattle as well as farming.

Liliana earns a living selling clothes. She has been doing this for more than 2 years, and her business is located in her home. Additionally, she works selling bananas and raising and selling barnyard fowl such as chickens, ducks and turkey, among others. The loan will be used to buy a larger quantity of clothes to increase the inventory of products that she offers in her store. With new inventory she hopes to satisfy the needs of her customers, which will be reflected in an increase in her level of income and ultimately in her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of clothes to increase the inventory of products that she offers in her store.

loans.name: Aya

texts.en:
Aya is a 22 year old woman who is engaged. For the past four years, she has been tutor. The job allows her to pay for her family's needs and expenses.  

Aya is an ambitious lady who works hard to satisfy her family's needs and help her fiance build their future together. Currently, Aya's limited income is not enough to meet her needs. She is requesting a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to purchase items she needs for her wedding day, such as pajamas, clothing, and accessories.

In the future, Aya hopes to open her own tutoring center to increase her income and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase items for her wedding

loans.name: Hülya

texts.en:
Hülya is married and has one child. For the past two years, she has bought and sold various textile products (quilt covers, clothing and blankets). Hülya likes her job. She usually sells in her own and surrounding villages. 

This will be her second loan. She’ll use it to buy quilt covers, clothing and blankets. She doubled her profits with the first loan. She expects to earn 100% profit on the products she’ll buy with this loan. As she is young, Hülya wants to educate her child and buy a house with her profits.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Hülya Hanım evli ve bir çocuk annesi.  Hülya Hanım iki buçuk yıldır çeşitli tekstil ürünleri (nevresim,kıyafet,battaniye) alıp satıyor.  Satışını genellikle köyünde ve çevre köylerde yapıyor.  İkinci  mikro krediyi  kullandı.  Aldığı kredi ile  nevresim,kıyafet,battaniye çeşitleri alacak.  İlk aldığı kredi ile de mal almış karını ikiye katlamıştı.  Bu kredi ile alacağı ürünlerden de yüz de yüz kar bekliyor.  Yaptığı işten memnun.  Yaşının daha genç olduğunu bu işi de devam ettirerek çocuğunu okutmak ve bir ev sahibi olmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy quilt covers, clothing, and blankets

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay university tuition and fees.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es:
La socia  pertenece al banco “Los Lideres” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú.  
La socia tiene 39 años de edad y tiene 03 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando  en sus discotecas o centros de diversión nocturna, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia Marlene está solicitando el préstamo para comprar licores, gaseosas entre otros.
La socia Marlene está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle continuar con su actividad económica la cual representa el principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia.
texts.en:
Marlene is a member of the Communal Bank “Los Lideres” (The Leaders) which is in the city of Cusco, Peru. She is 39 years old and has three children. Marlene divides her time between her daily activities and managing her discothèques and nightclubs. She has been in this business for quite some time and is doing very well thanks to the effort she puts forth each day into her work. Marlene wants to keep working so that she can continue to support her family.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy liquor, sodas, and other products. Marlene is very appreciative to Kiva for allowing her to continue her business since it represents the main source of income for sustaining her family.

loans.use: to buy liquor, sodas, and other products to serve at her discothèques and nightclubs.

loans.name: Mariana De Jesús

texts.es:
En el cantón 24 De Mayo se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Nuevos Horizontes De 24 de Mayo, este lugar es conocido por sus paisajes hermosos y por su gente trabajadora dedicada a la agricultura y cría de animales. 
En este lugar vive a la señora Mariana, tiene 62 años de edad, hace varios años su querido esposo falleció pero de esa relación tienen seis hijos mayores e independientes.
Doña Mariana hace poco surtió una pequeña tienda en su casa y también se dedica a la venta de empanadas, jugos y bolos, ella los fines de semana instala un pequeño local en las afueras de su casa donde vende estos alimentos que son del agrado de sus clientes, también cría pollos los mismos que le dejan ganancias extra que le sirven para salir adelante.
Ella está repitiendo el crédito, gracias a su crédito anterior pudo surtir una pequeña tienda la misma que le está dejando muy bueno ingresos que le sirven para salir adelante. Este crédito es para comprar productos de primera necesidad para surtir su tienda y víveres para preparar los alimentos. Esta desde el inicio en el grupo de crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños es tener buena salud.
texts.en:
In the 24 De Mayo canton the borrowing group Nuevos Horizontes De 24 De Mayo holds meetings. This place is known for its beautiful landscapes and hard-working people employed in agriculture and animal raising. Mariana lives here and she's a 62 year old whose beloved husband passed away several years ago. That relationship produced six children who are now independent adults.
Mariana recently stocked a small store in her home and she also works selling empanadas, juices, and rolls. On weekends she sets up a small shop just outside of her house where she sells these foods that her customers enjoy. She also raises chicks, which leave a profit that helps her get ahead.
She's applying for a loan again, and thanks to the previous loan she was able to stock a small store that is creating very good income and helps her move forward. This loan is to purchase essential products to stock her store and ingredients to prepare food. She has been in the borrowing group since it began and she enjoys it because the loans help her a lot. Her dream is to be in good health.

loans.use: To purchase essential products and ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy blocks, cement, and paint in order to repair a room in his home.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 58 años de edad, es casado, vive con su cónyuge y su hijo en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Pomahuaca, provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La población del distrito se dedica principalmente a la agricultura y ganadería.

El se dedica a brindar servicios de transporte de pasajeros en su mototaxi, así como también trabaja como peón agrícola. Cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El destino del crédito será para la compra de una nueva unidad móvil (mototaxi) debido a que la que utiliza actualmente se encuentra en mal estado. Con esto Pedro espera brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, aumentando así su nivel de ingresos y con ello su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Pedro is 58 years old, married, and lives with his wife and son in his own home made of rustic materials in the Pomahuaca district, Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Perú. The population of the district mainly works in agriculture and livestock.

He works providing transportation services to passengers on his motorcycle taxi, and he also works as a farm laborer. He has experience in this business and has very good personal and work references in his district. The loan will be used to buy a new motorcycle taxi because the one he currently uses is in poor state. With this, Pedro hopes to provide a better service to his customers, thereby increasing his profit and with that his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a new motorcycle taxi because the one he currently uses is in poor state.

loans.name: Dios Es Mi Fortaleza Group

texts.es: Al grupo solidario Dios es mi fortaleza lo integran tres mujeres emprendedoras, coordinado por la señora Johana de 44 años de edad, casada y comerciante de ropa nueva y comida en su domicilio y de manera ambulante desde hace diez años, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de azúcar, arroz, plátano verde, bidones de aceite, vestidos, blusas, pantalones, etc. Los logros obtenidos han sido múltiples y asegura que el ofrecer el servicio de comida le ha ayudado mejorando sus ingresos. El resto de las integrantes son, Flor de 26 años de edad, quien se dedica a la comercialización de cosméticos AVON y Zermat, y Blanca de 57 años de edad propietaria de una pulpería desde hace ocho años.
texts.en: The Dios Es Mi Fortaleza Solidarity Group is made up of three enterprising women, coordinated by Johana, who is 44 years old, married, and who has sold new clothing and prepared food in her home and on foot for 10 years.  She is requesting this loan to buy sugar, rice, green bananas, drums of oil, dress, blouses, pants, etc.  She has achieved many things and she assures us that her offering prepared foods has helped increase her income.  The rest of the members are Flor, who is 26 years old and who sells AVON and Zermat cosmetics, and Blanca, who is 57 and has owned a small grocery store for eight years.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, green bananas, drums of oil, dress, blouses, pants, etc.

loans.name: Beder Miguel

texts.es:
Beder tiene 38 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente. Su familia es unida, vive en casa propia con su cónyuge e hijos en el distrito de Zaña, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Las actividades principales que se desarrollan en este distrito son la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como cuyes, gallinas, patos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 04 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales. También brinda servicios como obrero agrícola en la zona lo que le genera ingresos adicionales. El crédito será utilizado para la compra de materiales como ladrillos, cemento, madera, fierros, entre otros, para el arreglo del corral donde cría a sus animales, así como también para la construcción de jaulas para estos. Esta inversión le permitirá tener su corral en óptimas condiciones y mejorar su calidad de crianza, lo que repercutirá en su nivel de ventas y con esto mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Beder, age 38, is married, and his family is united.  He lives in his own house with his wife and children in the Zaña district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.  The main business activities carried out in this district are agriculture, livestock, and commerce.

He raises and sells small animals like guinea pigs, chickens, and ducks, among others.  His business is located at his house.  He has four years of experience in the business, and he has very good personal and work references.  He also provides his services as an agricultural worker in the area.  This generates additional income.

The loan will be used to buy materials like bricks, cement, wood, and iron, among others to fix the corral where he raises the animals.  He will also build cages for them.  This investment will allow him to have a corral that is in optimal condition and improve his quality of care.  This will have an effect on his level of sales, and with this he will improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy materials like bricks, cement, wood, and iron, among others to fix the corral where he raises the animals.

loans.name: Aliveta

texts.en:
Aliveta is 46 years old, married, and has two children. She is in the agricultural business, raising cattle in the Philippines. Aliveta requested a 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy vitamins and other supplies for her cattle.

Aliveta has been raising cattle for five years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. Aliveta would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and other supplies for her cattle

loans.name: Yo Si Puedo. Group

texts.es: Yo sí puedo está integrado por cuatro mujeres emprendedoras que solicitan por primera vez el financiamiento en ADIM con el objetivo de incrementar su capital de trabajo, es coordinado por Elizabeth una mujer de 27 años de edad, acompañada, comerciante de mariscos y cosméticos de manera ambulante, el crédito lo solicita para la compra pescado mareño, chuleta de pescado, pargos, etc., con el objetivo de cubrir la demanda que tiene de esos productos, y así pagar las cuotas en el tiempo establecido. El resto de las integrantes son las señoras, Yadira de 59 años de edad y quien comercializa artesanías en diversos departamentos del país desde hace treinta años, Johana quien tiene la edad de 37 años dedicada a la comercialización de frutas y verduras en las calles de la capital, y Jaqueline de 34 años de edad y quien comercializa especies desde hace ocho años.
texts.en: Yo Sí Puedo is made up of four enterprising women who ask for a loan from ADIM for the first time, with the objective to increase their working capital. It is coordinated by Elizabeth, a 27-year-old woman, partnered, who sells shellfish and cosmetics as a street vendor. The loan she requests is to purchase marine fish, fish fillets, snappers, etc., with the goal to meet the demand that she has for these products, and also to make the payments on the established schedule. The other members are Yadira, 59 years old who has sold handicrafts in various departments of the country for thirty years, Johana who is 37 years old and works selling fruits and vegetables in the streets of the capital, and Jaqueline, 34 years old, who has sold spices for the past eight years.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics and shellfish, which will allow her to increase the products she offers.

loans.name: Quang

texts.en:
Mr. Quang works in agriculture, farming food. He is 28 years old and he is married, with two children. He lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Quang's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Quang has been involved in his business for five years. The main hardship that Quang faces in his life is not having a hygienic latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.

With his business profit, Quang hopes to maintain a successful business, to make enough money to provide for his children, and for his children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en: The borrower is married and lives with his wife and two children. He currently works as an operator in a manufacturing company for A/C. This job allows him to support his family. He is a hardworking and responsible father. His wife has developed  a hereditary vision problem that is affecting her on daily life activities since she cannot see from  a far distance. He is using this loan to help his wife to pay the eye surgery.

loans.use: To have an eye surgery

loans.name: Bernadeth

texts.en: Bernadeth works hard to support her family. She is married and has a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Bernadeth requested a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs. Bernadeth has been in this business for five years now. In the future, Bernadeth would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is a serial social entrepreneur.  Mother of three with an MBA, Beatrice has worked as an accountant, started her own catering company, and is the founder and headmaster of a primary school.  Beatrice started Rise to Shine (risetoshine.org) in 2011, a nursery and primary school located in fast growing Kigali suburb. Beginning with just one classroom for nursery students, Beatrice has grown the school every year by adding on another grade and classroom.

In June 2014, Rise to Shine received a grant to construct 4 new classrooms, which will allow Beatrice to nearly double her student capacity. The funding covered most of the construction, but Beatrice needs a loan for 5,783 USD to finish the classrooms and build classroom furniture.

Beatrice is a new borrower with AEC, but she has successfully repaid other past loans at Rise to Shine. She is a trusted woman with a great network of resources. This funding is the final installment needed to complete the school.

Thank you for your consideration!

loans.use: To finish constructing 4 primary school classrooms

loans.name: Delida Yosabeth

texts.es:
Delida de 29 años de edad, está acompañada y tiene un hijo de 2 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, su pareja es docente y solo él y su hijo viven con ella. Delida es empleada desde hace varios años, su horario es de 8:00 am a 4:00 pm.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar medicamentos para su hijo que cada mes necesita un tratamiento médico, además se le hará un examen de rayos X, Delida sueña con que su hijo mejores y crezca gozando de buena salud
texts.en:
Delida, 29 years old, is partnered and has a son who is 2 years old. She studied up to secondary school, her partner is a teacher and only he and their son live with her. Delida has been employed for some years, her schedule is 8:00 am to 4:00 pm.

She asks for the loan to purchase medicines for her son who needs a medical treatment each month; in addition, they will do an x-ray on him.  Delida dreams that her son will improve and grow enjoying good health.

loans.use: to purchase medicine for her child.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en: The borrower is married and currently lives with his wife and children. He's currently employed in a company. He describes himself as a hardworking person, full of projects and goals, with the drive to achieve them. A few months ago his dad was diagnosed with an eye retina problem and needs surgery. He's currently supporting him financially. Due to his father's health related problems, his father cannot work. That's the main reason he couldn't have the surgery performed in the past. He is using this loan to help his father to pay the eye surgery.

loans.use: To have an eye surgery

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.en: The borrower is married and lives with her husband and two children. She has worked in a company for a few years now. She works hard to support her family. Her father is now retired and she is helping her parents financially. Her father has developed vision problems and she decided to take him to get a vision exam. They found out he had an eye retina problem. He has been using glasses for a very long time. He's having frequent headaches and pain in the eyes. The only option for him is to have surgery, but due to the high cost he couldn't have the surgery done in the past. She is using this loan to help his father to pay the eye surgery.

loans.use: To have an eye surgery

loans.name: Gatrar Mahila Mandal Group

texts.en:
Nayanaben (standing in the center) leads the Gartrar Mahila Mandal, a Joint Liability Group (JLG) comprising five confident and industrious women members from the small town of Gandhidham, in the Kutch district of Gujarat. She contributes almost 60% of her family’s income through the money she earns from her microenterprise selling clothes to local women. Nayanaben buys readymade ethnic garments from the wholesale market at cheaper rates and sells them to local women at retail prices. The profit she nets keeps her family fed, her children in school, and lets her save a small amount of Rs. 2,000 each month.

At 46, Nayanaben shoulders the responsibility of providing for her family of five, including two teen-aged children. She couldn't attend school due to the orthodox beliefs of her family. But now things have changed in her community, and she knows all too well the integral role that education plays in shaping an individual. She is ready to put in as much effort as it takes to provide the best of education to her children.

To that end, Nayanaben seeks to grow her microenterprise. She wants to buy fast-selling items like salvar kameez sets, dupattas, scarves, and other locally favored garments in bulk, negotiating better rates with her suppliers. She also wants to add more variety to her inventory, so she can attract more customers. With these measures, she projects an increase of 50% in her monthly income, allowing her to more than double her monthly savings.

With the ongoing auspicious festive and wedding season in India, she is seeing a surge in demand from her customers. Right now would be an excellent time for Nayanaben to put her expansion plans into action instead of waiting months or years to save the capital first and then grow her business. So, together with her group members, she seeks a loan of Rs. 70,000. Maniben and Vasantiben also sell readymade garments, Anjuben caters ready meals through her tiffin service, and Kantaben rears livestock. Your timely loan will help them all reap sizeable profits by expanding their small businesses.

Lending a little will definitely help change the lives of Nayanaben, her family, and those of others in her group. This will be a pivotal step towards her goals of ensuring a good education for her children.

loans.use: to buy traditional garments such as salwar kameezes, dupattas, and scarves for growing her clothes-selling microenterprise.

loans.name: Las Rositas Group

texts.es: Esta es la Nueva Alcancía “Las Rositas” La cual  está constituida por 06 socias con muchas ganas de comenzar a desarrollarse en sus negocios. Roxana de 29 años de edad es separada con 02 hijos dependientes. Ella se dedica  a la artesanía (elaboración de cerámicas). Hace más de 10 años que se desempeña en dicho negocio gracias a sus padres quienes los enseñaron.  Su mayor deseo es poder exportar a otros países. Solicitó el crédito para la compra de esmalte, arcilla y brochas. La Nueva Alcancía “Las Rositas” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por facilitarles este crédito. Roxana es la segunda del lado  izquierdo y viste polo celeste.
texts.en: This is the new communal bank "Las Rositas” which is made up of 6 members with a lot of desire to begin to develop themselves in their businesses. Roxana is 29 years old, separated, with two dependent children. She works making crafts (making ceramics). For the past 10 years she has worked in this business, thanks to her parents who taught it to her.  Her greatest desire is to be able to export to other countries. She asked for the loan to purchase varnish, clay and brushes. The new communal bank "Las Rositas" is grateful to the Kiva investors for making this loan possible. Roxana is the second from the left and wears a light blue shirt.

loans.use: to purchase varnish, clay and brushes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, and nails so that she can replace the roof of her home.

loans.name: Elias

texts.es:
El socio Elias pertenece al banco comunal MOSOC KILLA, el socio sigue dedicándose a su negocio de su taller de mecánica, el socio lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de herramientas como llantas, gatas entre otros.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Elias is a member of the "Mosoc Killa" Communal Bank, and he continues devoting himself to his mechanic shop business. He has had his business for a good while, and it is going well for him because of the effort that he puts into it every day. 

He wants to be able to continue working so that he can continue supporting his family. He is requesting the loan for the purchase of tools such as tires and jacks, among other items.  He feels thankful for the loan and he is committed to making his payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase tools such as tires and jacks, among other items.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en:
Catalina works hard to support her family. She is married and has a sewing business in the Philippines.

Catalina requested a 18,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional materials like fabric, thread, needles, etc. for her business.

Catalina has been in this business for 21 years now. In the future, she would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like fabric, thread, needles, etc.

loans.name: Leonita

texts.en:
Leonita is 63 years old, married, and has 10 children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional items like canned goods, snack foods, soft drinks, noodles, candies, cereals, etc. to sell.

Leonita has borrowed and paid 22 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from raising pigs. Leonita aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items like canned goods, snack foods, soft drinks, noodles, candies, cereals, etc. to sell

loans.name: Faustina

texts.es:
Faustina, de 65 años de edad, no estudio porque sus padres no le dieron importancia a su educación y solo la pusieron a trabajar, es madre soltera y tiene una hija de 43 años de edad que creció ella misma.

Faustina es empleada, se dedica a trabajar por la mañana en un hotel lavando ropa y encargada de la limpieza, por las tardes cuando llega a su casa elabora panes con pollo para vender, esto lo hace todos los días.

Solicita el préstamo para invertirlo en su negocio, comprando los productos que necesita como pan, repollo, condimentos, salsas y demás para preparar su venta. Otra parte la utilizará para cancelar una deuda que tiene.

El sueño de Faustina es siempre tener las fuerzas para seguir trabajando, ayudarle a sus dos nietos y que estudien para que lleguen a ser profesionales y gocen de las oportunidades que ella no tuvo por no estudiar.
texts.en:
Faustina, 65 years old, didn't go to school because her parents didn't give her education importance and only put her to work. She is a single mother and has a daughter who is 43 years old who she raised herself. 

Faustina is employed, she works in the mornings at a hotel, washing clothing and doing the cleaning, and in the afternoons, when she arrives home, she makes bread with chicken to sell.  She does this every day.

She asks for a loan to invest it in her business, purchasing the products she needs such as bread, cabbage, seasonings, sauces, and others to prepare her sales. The other part will be used to pay off a debt she has.  

Faustina's dream is to always have the strength to continue working, to help her two grandchildren so they can go to school to become professionals and enjoy the opportunities that she didn't have because she didn't go to school.

loans.use: to purchase bread, cabbage, seasonings, sauces, and more, and to pay off a debt.

loans.name: Yohana

texts.en: Yohana is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Yohana joined Babban Gona, primarily to create a better future for his children: Victor, Magret, and Jussiphine. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Yohana would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for his immediate cash needs, such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Yohana can now store his maize at harvest time. He can sell it a few months later, at a price up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. When asked, Yohana spoke of his ambition to use the additional income to educate his children. He hopes, eventually, to ensure that his children are educated and have professional jobs.

loans.use: to pay for school fees and uniforms for his children, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Barau

texts.en:
Barau is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Barau joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for his children: Hadiza, A'I and Mansur.  

Before he became a Babban Gona member, Barau would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Barau can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. 

When asked, Barau  spoke of his ambition to use the additional income to educate his children, eventually hoping to ensure his children are educated and have professional jobs.

loans.use: to pay for school fees and uniforms thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: AFI est âgée de 38 ans ; elle est  mariée et mère  quatre enfants. Elle vend  du bois de chauffe qu’elle achète  au marché de  Adakpamé . Elle a demandé ce crédit de   pour l’achat de bois de chauffage vendu en tas. AFI va au marché une fois par mois et avec les revenus de ses ventes elle  peut augmenter ses revenus et participer aux charges de la famille.
texts.en: Afi is 38 years old; she is married with four children. She sells firewood that she buys at the market in Adakpamé. She requested this loan to buy firewood that is sold in piles. She goes to the market once a month, and the income from her sales enables her earn more and help with the family expenses.

loans.use: to buy 100 piles of firewood.

loans.name: Maycol Luis

texts.es:
Maycol tiene 21 años, es soltero. Su familia es unida, vive en casa familiar con sus padres y hermanos en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Este distrito esta habitado por gente trabajadora dedicada principalmente al comercio y a la ganadería.

El se dedica a la crianza de ganado lechero, cuenta con 02 años de experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales. Adicionalmente brinda servicios como obrero agrícola en su distrito desde hace mas de 18 meses. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de animales menores como gallinas, pavos, cuyes, entre otros, así como para compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto Maycol espera brindar una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes, aumentando así su nivel de ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maycol, age 21, is single.  His family is united.  He lives in the family house with his parents and his siblings in the Cayaltí district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.  This district in inhabited by hard-working people who devote themselves primarily to commerce and livestock.

He raises dairy cows.  He has two years of experience in this sector, and he has very good personal and work references.  He has also been providing his services as an agricultural worker in his district for over 18 months.

The loan will be used to buy small animals like chicken, ducks, and guinea pigs, among others.  He will also use the loan to buy balanced feed for these animals.  By doing this Maycol hopes to provide a greater variety of products to his customers.  This way he will be increasing his level of income and, therefore, his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy small animals like chicken, ducks, and guinea pigs, among others.  He will also use the loan to buy balanced feed for these animals.

loans.name: Almeda

texts.en:
Almeda is 45 years old, married, and has four children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Almeda has borrowed and paid one loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from food vending. Almeda aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Maral

texts.ru: Марал успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению.  Она очень благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. Марал - мастер в своем деле. В хозяйстве Марал на сегодняшний день есть 8 дойных коров, ежедневно она продает по 50 литров домашнего, вкусного, экологически чистого молока. Ежемесячная прибыль Марал составляет около 30,000 сом (KGS). В целях увеличения поголовья скота и объемов реализации молока, она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом, в сумме 90,000 сом(KGS) на покупку 1 дойной коровы. Доходы от кредита Марал направит на дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса, что позволит в будущем накопить на покупку квартиры.
texts.en: Maral successfully paid off her previous loan, using it for its designated purpose. She is very grateful to Kiva and to all those who financially supported her last loan. Maral is an expert at her profession. Maral currently has 8 dairy cows on her farm. Everyday she sells about 50 liters of hand-milked, delicious, organic milk. Maral's average monthly income is 30,000 som (KGS). To increase the size of her herd and the volume of her milk sales, she turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan for 90,000 som (KGS) to buy one dairy cow. Maral plans to spend the earnings from the loan on the further development of her business, which will allow her to save money to buy an apartment in the future.

loans.use: to purchase one dairy cow.

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es:
La socia Yanet; pertenece al banco comunal MOSOC KILLA,la socia sigue dedicándose con el negocio de venta de comida caseras ,la socia a la vez continua dedicándose  a la venta por catalogo perfumes, cremas, labiales entre otros productos de belleza, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio ,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando  para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
 La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de colonias para damas.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Yanet is a member of the Communal Bank “Mosoc Killa”. She continues to manage her business of selling home-cooked food. Yanet also continues to sell perfumes, crèmes, lipsticks, and other beauty products through catalogs. She has been in these businesses for a long time and is doing well thanks to the effort she puts forth each day into her work. Yanet wants to keep working so that she can continue to support her family.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy women’s colognes. Yanet appreciates the loan that has been issued and promises to complete her payments according to the established terms.

loans.use: to buy women's colognes to sell.

loans.name: Teresa Del Carmen

texts.es: Teresa es una microempresaria laboriosa que tiene la edad de 58 años de edad, casada y dedicada a la comercialización de leña y pescado desde hace treinta años, este negocio lo impulsó con ayuda de su jefe ya que le brindó leña al crédito para que ella la comercializara, luego de sus ganancias ella impulsó la venta de pescados, esto le ha permitido apoyar con los gastos familiares, este crédito lo solicita para la compra de marca de leña, chuletas de pescado, pargo rojo, sardinas, etc.
texts.en: Teresa is a hard-working microentrepreneur who is 58 years old, married, and has worked selling firewood and fish for the past thirty years. She began this business with the help of her boss since he offered her firewood on credit, so that she could sell it. After earning money, she began to sell fish; this has allowed her to support the family expenses. She asked for this loan to purchase a bundle of firewood, fish fillets, snapper, sardines, etc.

loans.use: to purchase a bundle of firewood and shellfish, allowing her to meet the demand that she has for these products.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva is 48 years old and married with four children, two of whom are in school. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Eva runs a vegetable-vending business in the Philippines and she requested a PHP 15,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy additional vegetables to sell, like horseradish and radishes.

Eva has been in this business for 15 years. She would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional vegetables to sell, like horseradish and radishes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover medical expenses, such as special exams and the cost of medicines.

loans.name: Luz Mirella

texts.es:
Luz, una sonriente, carismática y amable mujer del campo, que no opto por seguir los pasos de sus padres dedicándose a la agricultura por el contrario emprendió su propio camino y se dedicó a la venta de mercancía, una actividad poco usual en los campesinos.
Se dedica a la venta de productos para el cuidado de la piel y electrodomésticos y gracias a estas ventas que en el sector de ella es tan poco común ha podido generar los recursos para mantener a su familia que la compone su pareja y tres hijos todos ellos menores de edad.
Solicita un crédito para comprar mercancía y seguir demostrando que seguir sus propios pasos fue la mejor decisión que pudo tomar para su vida.
Dale tu apoyo, un voto de confianza que le permitirá seguir creciendo como empresa y dándole a su familia una buna calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luz, a smiling, charismatic, and friendly country woman who chose not to follow her parents footsteps working in agriculture.  Rather, she took her own path and started up a business selling merchandise.  This type of activity is unusual among the rural people.

Luz sells skin care products and appliances.  Thanks to her sales, which are not common in her neighborhood, she has been able to generate resources to support her family, which includes her partner and 3 minor children.  

Luz is requesting a loan to buy merchandise so that she can continue to demonstrate that following her own path has been the best decision that she could make for her life.  Give her your support, a vote of confidence that will enable her to continue to grow as a businesswoman and provide her family with a good quality of life.

loans.use: to buy products to sell, including skin care products, cosmetics, and household appliances

loans.name: Loan

texts.en:
Mrs. Loan operates a food stall/restaurant, selling fish. She is 35 years old and she is married, with two children. She lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Loan's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Loan has been involved in her business for eight years. The main hardship that Loan faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Loan hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to do well in school, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Elisa works hard to support her family.

She has a basket weaving business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Elisa is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional materials for her basket weaving business.

Elisa has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her weaving business

loans.name: Salma

texts.en:
Salma is 54, married, and a mother of three. She is a loving and caring mother. 

Salma's husband does paint work. He paints the walls of offices, households and different business outlets. This profession is not very lucrative and requires intense labor. He is hardworking and disciplined. In order to complete more orders, he wants to buy raw materials like paints, oil, brushes, etc. In this way, he plans to enhance his business. 

Salma has therefore requested a loan which will help him buy these materials. She is hopeful that this investment will prove to be fruitful.

loans.use: to enhance her husband's paint work by buying raw materials like paints, oil, brushes, etc

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
