Elvira is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 32 years old and has one child who is currently in school.

Elvira has a bakery business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her bread production business.

Elvira has been in this business for three years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her bread production business

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
As a married parent of eleven children, Emma works hard to support her family.

She has a basket weaving business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from general store. Emma is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy more materials for her basket weaving business.

Emma has been sustaining her business activities through her past 11 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more materials for her basket weaving business

loans.name: Expedito

texts.en:
Expedito works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy and sell charcoal and firewood business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of firewood and sacks of charcoal to sell.

Expedito has been in this business for five years now.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of firewood and sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Anselma

texts.en:
Anselma is 58 years old and married with seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Anselma has a fruit and vegetable vending business in the Philippines. Anselma has requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more fruits and vegetables to sell.

Anselma has been in this business for 20 years. Anselma would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Bernardita

texts.en:
Bernardita is 63 years old and married with five children.  

She is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Bernardita requested a PHP 21,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Bernardita has been in pig fattening for six years now, and has borrowed 16 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Bernardita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Camela

texts.en:
Camela is 67 years old and widowed with four children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Camela runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 24,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks like shampoo, detergent soap, canned goods, coffee, juice, cereals, etc., to sell.

She has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as shampoo, detergent soap, canned goods, coffee, juice, cereals, etc. 

In the future, Camela would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks like shampoo, detergent soap, canned goods, coffee, juice, cereals, etc., to sell

loans.name: Lena

texts.ru: Лена, 63 года, замужем, мать 7 детей, две дочери живут вместе с Леной. У Лены- среднее образование,она знает как правильно использовать и планировать денежные средства для достижения поставленных целей. Лена на пенсии, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством. Стартовав 30 лет назад, в хозяйстве Лены на сегодняшний день имеется 1 корова, 1 бычок и 10 овец. На участке мерою 6,0 Га она выращивает клевер и кукурузу. Ежемесячный доход Лены от 15,000 сом до 20,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита позволят Лене развить ее бизнес, нарастить активы и достроить дом для сына.
texts.en: Lena is 63 years old, married, and a mother to 7 children. Two of her daughters live with her. Lena has a secondary education. She knows how to correctly use and manage her money for accomplishing her stated goals. Lena is a pensioner. As the main source of income for her family, she practices livestock breeding and crop farming. She started this business 30 years ago. Lena currently has 1 cow, 1 bull-calf and 10 sheep on her farm. She also has a 6.0 hectare plot of land on which she grows clover and corn. Her monthly income is between 15,000 som (KGS) and 20,000 som (KGS). She turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum" for a 40,000 som (KGS) loan to buy sheep to fatten up and resell. The earnings from the loan will allow Lena to develop her business, accumulate assets, and build a house for her son.

loans.use: to purchase sheep for fattening up and reselling.

loans.name: Jasmin

texts.en:
Jasmin is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a bicycle transport business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to buy additional bicycle for her bicycle transport business.

Jasmin has been in this business for two years. She earns more income from fish vending.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional bicycle for her business

loans.name: Jean

texts.en:
Jean is 29 years old and has three children. She is married and has two children who are currently in school.

Jean is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Jean has been pig fattening for 10 years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Jean would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Jena

texts.en:
Jena is a married woman with one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 38 years old and has one child who is in school.

Jena has a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers.

Jena has been in this business for five years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers

loans.name: Judelyn

texts.en:
Judelyn is 21 years old and has one child. She is married and has one child who is in school.

Judelyn is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Judelyn has been in pig fattening for three years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Judelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Sebastian

texts.es:
Sebastián de 42 años de edad, está acompañado y tiene dos hijos que están estudiando, él estudió hasta 6° grado de educación básica, con él solo vive su esposa que es ama de casa y sus hijos.

Sebastián es agricultor y ganadero desde hace 28 años, aprendió de sus padres como cultivar granos básicos y criar ganado ya que ellos se dedicaban a lo mismo y como le gustó mucho decidió dedicarse a lo esta actividad. Para llegar al lugar donde trabaja se desplaza cerca de 6 kilómetros y trabaja aproximadamente 7 horas al día. Esta es su única actividad económica y es con la que ha sacado adelante a su familia.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar dos vacas productoras de leche, para aumentar la producción de esta y la del queso, con esto espera satisfacer la gran demanda de los lácteos en la zona y aprovechar que el precio de los animales está relativamente bajo.

Los sueños del cliente, son seguir trabajando fuerte en lo que le gusta, desea un día tener su propio puesto de lácteos para la venta. Para su familia desea que sus hijos logren sacar una carrera profesional donde puedan cumplir sus objetivos. El préstamo  le ayudara a mejorar su activada económica y mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Sebastian is 42 years old. He has a companion and two children who attend school. He studied up to sixth grade of elementary school. He lives with his wife, who is a housewife, and his children. Sebastian has been a farmer and has raised cattle for 28 years. He learned from his parents how to cultivate basic grains and raise cattle, because they worked in this same activity. Since he liked it a lot he decided to work in it, too. To get to his workplace he travels almost 6 kilometers, and he works approximately 7 hours per day. This is his only job and with it he has moved his family ahead. He is requesting a loan to buy two milk producing cows to increase his milk and cheese production. With this he hopes to satisfy the great demand of dairy products in his area and take advantage of the relatively low price of the animals. Sebastian's dreams are to keep on working hard in what he likes. He would like to have his own dairy stand for sale. For his family he wishes that his children get a professional education where they can fulfill their objectives. The loan will help him to improve his financial activity and improve his financial resources.

loans.use: to buy two milk producing cows.

loans.name: Elvia

texts.es:
Elvia tiene 41 años de edad, es casada, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Cayalti, provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú. La comunidad se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, desde hace más de 6 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio. Cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de calaminas para construir y techar los corrales donde se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y de esta manera tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes. Con esto Elvia espera mejorar su nivel de ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Elvia is 41 years old.  She is married and lives with her husband and children in the district of Cayalti in the province of Chiclayo which is part of the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru.  The community members work mainly in agriculture, commerce and raising livestock.

She works at raising and selling pigs.  She has done this for more than 6 years.  Her business is located on land at the back part of her house.  She has many very good personal and work references from the area.  She has asked for this loan in order to purchase corrugated metal sheets for building and roofing the pens where she raises pigs and in this way have a better output to offer to her customers.  

With this Elvia hopes to improve the level of her income and thus the quality of her life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase corrugated metal sheets for building and roofing the pens where she raises pigs

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is 45 years old and married.

Julieta earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy feed, vaccines and vitamins for her pigs.

Julieta has been in pig fattening for 10 years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccines and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Babylou

texts.en:
Babylou is 21 years old and has two children. Babylou is married and one of her children is currently in school.

Babylou is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Babylou has requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Babylou has been in the pig fattening business for two years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Babylou would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Virgilia

texts.en:
Virgilia is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 33 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

She has a buy and sell firewood business in the Philippines. Virgilia requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more firewood to sell to her customers.

She has been in this business for six years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more firewood to sell to her customers

loans.name: Leza

texts.en:
Leza is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a selling charcoal business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers for her selling charcoal business.

Leza has been in this business for six years. She earns more income from a general store.

Leza has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers

loans.name: Ma. Editha

texts.en:
Ma. Editha is 45 years old and married with two children.  

She is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Ma. Editha has been in pig fattening for seven years now, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients like fish, spices, vegetables, noodles, meat, etc., for her business.

Mary Ann has been in this business for two years now.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like fish, spices, vegetables, noodles, meat, etc., for her food vending business

loans.name: Nelita

texts.en:
Nelita is 48 years old and married with four children.

Nelita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock like detergent soap, fabric conditioner, shampoo, canned goods, soft drinks, cereals, coffee, etc. to sell.

Nelita has borrowed and paid back 10 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for six years and also earns an income from pig fattening.

Nelita aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stock like detergent soap, fabric conditioner, shampoo, canned goods, soft drinks, cereals, coffee, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en:
Remedios is 39 years old and has five children. She is married and has three children who are currently in school.

Remedios is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Remedios has been in pig fattening for eight years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Remedios would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Salve

texts.en:
Salve is 31 years old and has four children. She is married and has two children who are currently in school.

She is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Salve has been pig fattening for three years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Salve would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Flora works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell spare parts business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a repair shop. Flora is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase more spare parts to sell for her buy and sell spare parts business.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her past 11 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more spare parts to sell

loans.name: Judy

texts.en:
Judy is a married woman with eleven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Judy is 41 years old and has six children who are currently in school.

Judy has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional materials and gear for her business.

Judy has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials and gear for her business.

loans.name: Gulnara

texts.ru: Гулнара, 53 года, замужем, есть 5 детей. У Гулнары средне-специальное образование. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, с 1995 года занимается сельским хозяйством, начав этот бизнес с 10,000 сом (KGS). В хозяйстве Гулнары есть 5 коров, 2 лошади и 20 овец. На участке мерою 7,11 Га она выращивает свеклу, клевер и ячмень. Вся экологически чистая продукция Гулнары пользуется большим спросом и приносит хорошую прибыль в размере около 30,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы и корма для скота на зиму. Сохранение скота и хороший откорм в зимний период позволит получить здоровый приплод. Доходы от кредита Гулнара планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего бизнеса, чтобы накопить средства на свадьбу сына.
texts.en: Gulnara is 53 years old, married, and has 5 children. Gulnara has a secondary-specialized education. As the main source of income for her family, she has been farming since 1995. She started this business with 10,000 som (KGS). Gulnara has 5 cows, 2 horses and 20 sheep on her farm. She also has a 7.11 hectare plot of land on which she grows beets, clover and barley. Gulnara's organic produce is in high demand and brings in a good income of about 30,000 som (KGS). For the further development of her business, she turned to Microfinance Bank 'Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan for 100,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow and cattle feed for the winter. Having a store of cattle and good feed for them during the winter will allow her to receive healthy offspring from them. Gulnara plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the expansion of her business so that she can save money for her son's wedding.

loans.use: to purchase one cow and cattle feed for the winter season.

loans.name: Maria Gina

texts.en:
Maria Gina works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines.

Maria Gina requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials for her business.

Maria Gina has been in this business for six years now.

In the future, Maria Gina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her business

loans.name: Santa

texts.en:
Santa is 38 years old and married with three children. With three children currently in school, she works very hard to provide for them.

Santa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Santa has been in this business for 15 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, snack foods, soft drinks, cereals, detergent soap, shampoo, etc.

In the future, Santa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Giang

texts.en:
Mr. Giang operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. He has been involved in this business for three years.

Giang is 23 years old, and he is married with one child. Giang lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Giang’s first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns him is not having a hygienic latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet.

With his business profit, Giang Phạm hopes for his family to be healthy and happy, to maintain a successful business, and for his business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Aizhan

texts.ru: Айжан, 41 год, замужем, мать 3 детей. У Айжан - среднее образование, с 1992 года она занимается животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 3 коровы, 20 овец и 1 лошадь. На участке мерою 0,82 Га она выращивает ячмень для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). На ежедневной основе Айжан продает молоко местным жителям. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 дойных коров, для увеличения объемов реализации экологически чистого, вкусного, домашнего молока. Доходы от кредита помогут Айжан в дальнейшем увеличивать поголовье скота и построить сараи для скота.
texts.en: Aizhan is 41 years old, married and a mother to 3 children. Aizhan has a secondary education. Since 1992, she has been practicing livestock breeding. Thanks to her hard work, she currently has 3 cows, 20 sheep and 1 horse on her farm. She also has a 0.82 hectare plot of land on which she grows barley for personal consumption and sale. Her average monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). Everyday Aizhan sells milk to local residents. For the further development of her business, she turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan for 100,000 som (KGS) to buy 2 dairy cows so that she can increase her sales volume of delicious, homemade, organic milk. The earnings from the loan will allow Aizhan to increase the size of her herd and buy a barn for her cattle in the future.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows to increase her sales volume of organic milk.

loans.name: Belinda

texts.en:
Belinda is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Belinda is 39 years old and two of her children are currently in school.

Belinda has a basket weaving business in the Philippines. Belinda has requested a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more raw materials for her business.

Belinda has been in this business for five years. In the future, Belinda would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials for her weaving business

loans.name: Ngân

texts.en:
Mrs. Ngân is 55 years old, and she is married with three children. She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province. Ngân works in agriculture, farming food.

This is Ngân's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Ngân has been involved in this business for more than ten years. The main hardship that Ngân faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Ngân hopes to maintain a successful business, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and she hopes that her children do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build atoilet

loans.name: Rosa Del Carmen

texts.es: Rosa es una microempresaria laboriosa que tiene la edad de 70 años, viuda, comerciante de frutas en el mercado municipal desde hace seis años, es el décimo ciclo que ADIM le brinda los financiamientos para su negocio y ha demostrado ser una persona responsable, este crédito lo solicita para la compra de papaya, tamarindo, nancite, tomate, cebolla, etc., de manera que seguirá diversificando los productos ofrecidos y que mayor demanda tiene.
texts.en: Rosa is a hard-working micro-entrepreneur who is 70 years old and widowed.  She has been a fruit merchant at the city market for 6 years.  This is the 10th time that ADM is providing financing for her business and she has demonstrated that she is a responsible person.  She is asking for this loan to buy papayas, tamarind, nances, tomatoes, and onions, etc. so that she can continue diversifying the products that she offers and increase her demand.

loans.use: to buy papayas, tamarind, nances, tomatoes, onions, and other produce so that she can increase the amount of products that she offers and improve her revenue from sales

loans.name: Huyền

texts.en:
Mrs. Huyền is 33 years old and she is married with two children. Huyền lives in Dong Son District, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. 

Huyền works in agriculture, farming food. Huyền has been involved in this business for seven years.

In 2013, Huyền joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Huyền has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. 

The main hardship that Huyền faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

In the future, Huyền hopes to build a new house, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet

loans.name: Sri

texts.en:
Hello, lender! Meet Sri, a micro-entrepreneur who lives in East Serang. Serang is a suburban city located about three hours’ drive from Jakarta.

Sri is happily married, and she and her husband have been blessed with two sons. Sri’s husband works as a factory laborer. His monthly wage covers just enough for the family’s needs, but it leaves them no money left for saving. Therefore, Sri and her husband are managing a small stall located in front of their house. They sell office stationery, drinks, and mobile phone airtime credits, and offer utility bill payment service.

Sri is the one who manages the stall on a daily basis. She started selling mobile airtime about six months ago when she met a Ruma field staff member who introduced her to Ruma. For the last three months, Sri has been performing well in providing mobile services in her community. She has the advantage to sell because her customers are mostly her neighbors who regularly come to her stall.

As the business runs, she needs working capital in order to process more transactions in her stall. Therefore, Sri is applying for a Kiva loan for the first time.

In the future, Sri plans to add more products to the things she sells, such as e-commerce for low-income communities.

In the photo, Sri is in her small stall with her son. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile services in her community.

loans.name: Nguyệt

texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyệt operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She has been involved in this business for five years.

Nguyệt is 28 years old, and she is married with two children. She lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2014, Nguyệt joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Nguyệt faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Nguyệt hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to do well in school, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan is 31 years old. She is married, and together with her spouse has been blessed with three children of 14, 12, and 5 years respectively.

Joan is a farmer, a business she has done for the last nine years. She earns a monthly income of KES 35,000.

Joan has requested her first loan with VisionFund Kenya of KES 20,000, which she will use to buy seedlings and fertilizers in preparation for the planting season.

Joan's hope and dream for the future is to be a productive farmer.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs.

loans.name: María Esperanza

texts.es:
María, de 58 años de edad, es viuda, su esposo ya falleció, tuvo tres hijos con su esposo, todos están acompañados, y hoy en día solo vive con una nieta.

María, para poder ganar dinero para su sustento se dedica a la compra y venta de lácteos, ella sale a vender por las casas de la comunidad, de esa manera ella gana para cubrir las necesidades de ella y su nieta.

María, ya tiene 6 años de trabajar con productos lácteos.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar leche, queso y crema. ya que debido a una enfermedad que la afectó repentinamente, tuvo que gastar el capital con el que compraba los lácteos, es por eso que necesita que se le ayude con el crédito, para continuar con su negocio y obtener sus ingresos.  

En el futuro María, desea ampliar mas su negocio y tener la venta de lácteos en su casa, para no tener que salir a la calle.
texts.en:
Maria is 58 years old and a widow; her husband has died. She had three children with her husband. All are married and she now lives with her granddaughter alone.

To earn money for her  sustenance, Maria buys and sells dairy products. She goes out to visit houses in the community to make sales. In this manner, she earns enough to cover necessities for her and her granddaughter.

Maria has been buying and selling dairy products for six years now.

Maria needs the loan for purchasing milk, cheese, and cream. Due to an illness that has frequently recurred, she has had to spend the capital which she would have used to buy her dairy products. Maria needs a loan so that she can continue her business and obtain necessary income.  

In the future, Maria wishes to expand her business and sell the dairy products from her house, to avoid having to go out into the streets.

loans.use: buy dairy products like milk, cheese, and cream to sell.

loans.name: Vicent

texts.en:
Vicent is a forty-year-old hardworking married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He deals in farming alongside the operation of a retail shop to earn an extra income. He started this business so as to educate his children.

He hopes to have a big coffee plantation. However, his main challenge is competition from other farmers.

He is requesting a loan to buy more farm inputs, such as husks and fertilizers, to improve his plantation.

loans.use: to buy more farm inputs, such as husks and fertilizers, to improve his plantation.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan, de 35 años de edad, junto a su esposa tiene dos hijos, la primera tiene cuatro años de edad y su segundo hijo tiene un año de edad.

Juan, vive junto a su familia y cada día sé esmera por sacarla adelante ya que debido a la situación       económica y al poco interés que le tenían  sus padres al estudio no pudo  estudiar, es por esa razón que aprendió el oficio de la albañilería y ya tiene 10 años de experiencia en este oficio, es así como hoy en día se gana la vida honradamente para poder mantener a su familia. 

El crédito lo necesita para comprar verduras como tomates, chiles, cebollas, papas, etc. ya que siempre en temporada navideña coloca este negocio porque le deja buenas ganancias.
Juan, sueña con tener una tienda surtida y permanente, no solo para la época de navidad, de esta manera espera obtener ingresos para su familia y trabajar desde su casa.
texts.en:
Juan lives with his family and every day he puts a lot of effort into getting them ahead.  He wasn't able to study because of his family's economic situation and because his parents weren't interested in educating him, so he learned the trade of bricklaying and he now has 10 years of experience in the business.  That is how he makes an honorable living and is able to support his family.  

He needs a loan to buy tomatoes, chillies, onions, potatoes, and other vegetables because he takes up the additional job of selling vegetables every year at Christmas time since it is a good source of revenue.  Juan's dream is to have a well-stocked and permanent store instead of one that is only open at Christmas time, and therefore be able to bring in income for his family and work from home.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, chillies, onions, potatoes, and other vegetables

loans.name: Patricia Margarita

texts.es: Patricia de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Patricia is 36 years old and lives in her own home with her extended family.  She has a small store located in her place of residence, and she has many customers thanks to the good prices that she offers and her friendliness as a salesman.  She is asking for a loan to buy more soap, eggs, basic grains, refreshments, candy, sweet bread, and other products so that she can increase her income and improve the quality of her life.

loans.use: to buy more soap, eggs, basic grains, refreshments, candy, sweet bread, and other products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee plantation.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: Jose es soltero no tiene hijos y vive solo en la ciudad de La Pazen en una casa de ladrillo y cemento donde paga un alquiler Jose trabaja arreglando y haciendo zapatos. Jose corre el riesgo de que su vista se canse y sus manos terminen lesionadas en cierto modo, pero aun aspi el cliente desea continuar con su labor, Jose quiere otro prestamo porque se le acabo la cuerina y desea abastecerse en gran cantidad para que le hagan un descuento en la compra Jose espera que sigan confiando en èl
texts.en: Jose is single and doesn’t have children. He lives in the city of La Paz in a wood and cement house that he pays rent for. Jose works by repairing and making shoes. Jose runs the risk of his vision growing tired and his hands becoming cut, but he still keeps working. Jose wants another loan because he’s out of imitation leather and wants to stock up in large quantities so he can get a discount on his purchase. Jose hopes you all continue to believe in him.

loans.use: to buy imitation leather.

loans.name: Chúc

texts.en:
Mrs. Chúc has a service business repairing electronics. Chúc has been involved in this business for five years. The main hardship that Chúc faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

Chúc is 56 years old, and she is married with one child. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa City, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Chúc's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

With her business profit, Chúc hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find a good job, and to remodel her house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Rosario Del Carmen

texts.es: Rosario de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, ella se dedica a la crianza de pollos desde hace un año, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona, ella eta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas pollos por mayor al igual que más concentrado para continuar con la crianza y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Rosario, 59, lives in her own house with her life partner.  She has earned a living for a year raising chickens.  She sells her products in the surrounding area.

She's requesting a loan to buy more chickens wholesale as well as concentrated feed to continue raising chickens and to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy more chickens wholesale

loans.name: Vilma Lilian

texts.es: Vilma de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijas, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace varios años, vende de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias y tiene muchos clientes, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Vilma, 41, lives in her own home with her husband and their three daughters. She has made a living selling clothes for several years. She sells by traveling to different towns and she has many customers. With the money she earns, she’s able to pay some household expenses. She is requesting a loan to buy more clothes wholesale so she can keep selling and earn more income.

loans.use: to buy clothes wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cheese, cream, soft cheese, cottage cheese, etc.

loans.name: Mainumby Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mainumby está en su ciclo número 4 del programa de comités de mujeres, es de la ciudad de Curuguaty, una zona muy lejana de la capital del país, eminentemente rural, donde todas las integrantes quieren mejorar sus vidas.
La Sra. Odelia integra este grupo y es la tesorera  del comité, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora, comenta que es maestra, pero que en busca de un mejor porvenir para su familia esta queriendo implementar la venta de prendas varias. Es muy sacrificada que quiere ir creciendo en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de prendas varias, de manera a poder implementar la venta de prendas varias que tiene planeada. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder salir adelante.
texts.en:
The Mainumby group is in its fourth cycle of the Women’s Committee program. It is from the city of Curuguaty, an area very far away from the capital of the country, predominantly rural, where all of the members wish to improve their lives. 

Odelia is a member of this group and is the committee treasurer. She is a hard working woman. She notes that she is a teacher but that in search of a better future for her family, she wants to implement the sale of various garments. It is very sacrificial that she wants to continue growing in life.

She is requesting this loan to buy various garments so that she can implement the sale of various garments that she has planed. She is thankful for this opportunity received to be able to move forward.

loans.use: to buy various garments to sell.

loans.name: Aynur

texts.en:
Aynur is married with two children. 

Aynur used Tupperware products and then began selling them. Her life has changed a lot since beginning this work. The extra income has helped her support her children and take care of household needs. With her second loan, Aynur will buy promotional items and increase her profits. 

Aynur wants her daughter to be educated and her son to be married. She likes this work a lot and recommends it to all home makers.

(This Field Partner may choose to leave the local language description below the English one.)

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff:

Aynur  Hanım evli iki çocuk annesi.  Aynur Hanım kullanıcı olarak başladığı tupperware ürünlerinin satıcısı olmuş.  Bu işe başladıktan sonra hayatında bir çok şey değişiyor.  Ek bir gelir sağlayarak çocuklarının ve evinin ihtiyaçlarını daha rahat karşılamaya  başlamış.  Aldığı ikinci kredi ile promosyonlu ürünler alıp satışını ve kazancını arttıracak.  Kızını okutmak ,oğlunu evlendirmek istiyor.  Bu işi çok seviyor ve tüm ev hanımlarına tavsiye ediyor.

loans.use: to buy Tupperware products for resale.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis tiene 55 años de edad, su estado civil es casado, tiene 4 hijos mayores de edad, vive en casa propia junto a su cónyuge en el distrito de La Matanza. La vida en el distrito se desarrolla tranquilamente debido a que en lo que respecta al negocio u a otra actividad que desarrollan sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería y crianza de animales como actividad principal. Su comunidad está ubicada en el distrito de La Matanza, provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza Luis es el servicio de albañilería. La actividad la realiza desde hace más de 15 años, en el distrito y anexos. El destino del crédito será para realizar la compra de materiales de construcción, los mismos que le servirán como herramientas de trabajo para el servicio que realiza. Luis comprará andamios, tablas, carretilla y otros. El mercado presenta buenas perspectivas debido a que el servicio es frecuente en la zona. Luis piensa trabajar otorgando buen servicio en base a buena mano de obra y así seguir siendo recomendado por sus clientes. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is 55 years old and married, with 4 adult children.  He lives in his own house with his wife in the district of La Matanza.  Life in this area is peaceful since the people who live there respect business and other economic activities.  The main economic actives of the area are agriculture, ranching, and animal husbandry.  Luis' community is located in the district of La Matanza, Morropón Province, Piura Region, on the north coast of Peru.  

Luis is in the bricklaying business.  He has been providing this service for more than 15 years within the district and in the surrounding area.  The loan will go towards buying construction materials which will serve as work tools for the service that he provides.  Luis will buy scaffolding, boards, wheelbarrows, and other materials.  The market for his service has good prospects since it is often needed in the area.  Luis intends to provide good service based on quality labor and therefore continue to be recommended by his clients.  This will allow him to increase his income in the short term and boost his profits in order to improve the quality of life of his family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials that will serve as work tools for the service that he provides

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy snacks, soft drinks, basic grains, coffee, soup, eggs, gelatin, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 23 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal como perfumes, cremas, desodorantes, lociones, etc. desde hace 2 años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante, la joven vive en casa propia con su madre y esta solicitando un crédito para a compra de mas productos por mayor para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: This young woman whose face has been pixellated as she is 23 years old and lives in a high-risk zone, has worked selling products for personal use such as perfumes, creams, deodorants, lotions, etc. for 2 years. She manages to get through with what she makes from the sales. She lives in her own home with her mother and is requesting a loan to buy more products wholesale to get a better income.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, deodorants, lotions, etc.

loans.name: Gladis Del Carmen

texts.es: Gladis de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su compañero de vida, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Gladis is 33 years old and lives in her own house with her two children and her life partner.  She has a small store located in her home, and she has a lot of customers thanks to the good prices that she offers and her friendliness as a salesman.  She is asking for a loan to buy more soap, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, candy, and sweet bread, among other products, so that she can increase her income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soap, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, candy, sweet bread, and other products.

loans.name: Alex

texts.en:
Hello, lenders! Meet Alex, one of the Ruma agents who lives in East Serang, a suburban city located about three hours’ drive from Jakarta. Alex is happily married – he and his wife have been blessed with two children. As a main job, Alex works as a staff member in a small company, but as a side job he also runs a small stall that sells snacks, drinks, mobile phone airtime credits, and utility bill payment service. 

He started selling mobile airtime and serving utility bill payment because he wanted to improve his business. His willingness to improve was what brought him to be introduced to a Ruma field staff. He then decided to join as a Ruma agent. Now as the business runs, the number of mobile service transactions in his shop is increasing and he needs more working capital to fulfill it. Therefore, he hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva in order to process such transactions in his community. 

In the photo, Alex is the one who is wearing a green t-shirt, while holding a Ruma banner in front of his stall with a Ruma field staff who’s wearing a grey hoodie. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile services in his community

loans.name: Kwembe Mpakani Group

texts.en:
Christina, who is in her mid-20s, is single with one child who is still in school. She has been selling fish for two years now. She works from 5 am to 10 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will will be Christina's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She will use this loan to buy fish and meet her customers' demands.  She dreams of building her own house.

Christina will share this loan with her loan group "Kwembe Mpakani" consisting of four members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy fish and meet her customers' demands

loans.name: Tuyết

texts.en:
Tuyết has a retail business selling electronics supplies.

Tuyết is 39 years old and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Dong Son district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Tuyết's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Tuyết has been involved in this business for more than ten years. 

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

In the future, Tuyết hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to  buy more farm inputs, like grass and fertilizers, to improve his plantation.

loans.name: Toàn

texts.en:
Toàn, 36, is married with two children. She has a tailoring business and has been involved in this business for five years. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa City, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province. Her main hardship in life is not having a latrine.

This is Toàn's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. She is requesting the loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet and bathroom.

Toàn hopes that her business profits will help her family be healthy and happy, her children to do well in school, and her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet and bathroom.

loans.name: Maria Veronica

texts.es:
María Verónica tiene 40 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijo, en una comunidad grande en la zona urbana de Cayalti, su población se dedica a la actividad de comercio y agricultura que pertenece a la Provincia de Chiclayo en la región de Lambayeque en la costa norte del Perú.

María Verónica se dedica a la actividad de servicio de tipeos e impresiones, desde hace más de 3 años de antiguedad en el negocio, en su propio domicilio. Ella solicita préstamo para el mantenimiento de su maquina y para la compra de una impresora - fotocopiadora. De esta manera hacer crecer más su negocio, captando nuevos clientes, lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria Veronica is 40 years old. She lives with her husband and son in a large community in the urban area of Cayalti. The population, which belongs to the Chiclayo province in the Lambayeque region of the northern coast of Peru, earns a living from trade and farming.

Maria Veronica has more than 3 years of experience in the printing and typing services business, from her own home. She is requesting this loan for maintenance of her machine and to buy a printer-photocopier. In this way, she will make her business grow more and capture new customers. In the short term, this will allow her to improve her income, increase her earnings and in the end, improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to maintain her machine and to buy a printer-photocopier.

loans.name: Keneth

texts.en:
Keneth is a 27-year-old hardworking married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He works in livestock rearing alongside farming, and he works in a retail shop to earn more income. He started this business so as to educate his children. He hopes to be a modern farmer, however his main challenge is inadequate capital. 

He is requesting for a loan to buy more cows to add to his farm .

loans.use: to buy more cows to add to his farm .

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica a la crianza de ganado desde hace 20 años, comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y tiene muchos clientes, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ganado para continuar con su trabajo y asi poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Juan is 56 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife. He has worked raising cattle for 20 years, selling his products in the surrounding villages and he has many customers. 

He is requesting a loan to buy more cattle and continue working and thus be able to have a better income.

loans.use: to buy more cattle.

loans.name: Mpunga Group

texts.en:
Emanuel is in his mid 20s and is single. He has been selling soft drinks for one and half years now. He works from 8am to 8pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.  

This will be Emanuel's third loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to increase his stock of drinks and has paid back all his loans successfully. He used the profit to take care of himself and cover his household expenses. He will use this loan to buy soft drinks and meet his customers' demand. He dreams of building his own house.

Emanuel will share this loan with his loan group "MPUNGA" which has three members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks and meet his customers' demand.

loans.name: Thắm

texts.en:
Thắm is 52 years old and she is married with three children. She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province. Mrs. Thắm works in agriculture, farming food.

This is Thắm's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Thắm has been involved in this business for more than ten years.

The main hardship that Thắm faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

In the future, Thắm hopes to maintain a successful business, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet

loans.name: Tanciana

texts.en:
Tanciana is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling dried fish in the Philippines. She is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more dried fish to sell.

Tanciana has been in this business for three years. Tanciana earns additional income from a general store.

Tanciana has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more dried fish to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy poultry

loans.name: Farogat

texts.en: Farogat is a business woman who has worked from childhood. She was born in 1980. She lives in a rural area. She is married and has four children. Farogat has her own business in agriculture, planting and selling forage. Year after year, her activity has become stronger. Now her business is doing well. She wants to increase her business. Farogat wants to gain more profit from her business. She is asking for a loan of 5,000 TJS to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers for the new sowing season. She wants to feed her family and provide them with better living conditions. She needs financial support to grow her business.

loans.use: To buy seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Susilawati

texts.en:
Hello, lender! Meet Susilawati, a micro entrepreneur who lives in North Bogor, a semi-urban city located about a two hours drive from Jakarta. She is happily married, and she and her husband have been blessed with three children. To support the family, Susilawati and her husband run a small stall that sells stationery, mobile phone airtime credits, and utility bill payment services. 

Susilawati started selling mobile airtime about nine months ago when she met a Ruma field staff who introduced her to Ruma. For the last three months, Sri has been performing well in providing mobile services in her community. She has an advantage to sell because her customers are mostly her neighbors who regularly come to her stall. 

As the business grows, she needs more working capital in order to process more transactions in her stall. Therefore, Susilawati is applying for a Kiva loan for the first time. 

In the future, Susilawati plans to add more products to the thing she sells, such as e-commerce for low income communities. In the photo, Susilawati is in her small stall. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile services in her community

loans.name: Thanh

texts.en:
Thanh is 39 years old and she is married with two children. She is a teacher. Thanh lives and works in Thanh Hoa City, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Thanh's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Thanh faces in her life is not having a latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet and bathroom.

With her business profit, Thanh hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to do well in school, and to travel for vacation within the country.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build toilet and bathroom.

loans.name: Milagros Del Pilar

texts.es:
Milagros tiene 26 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en el distrito de La Matanza, provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en el lugar es tranquila, sus pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la venta de chicha (bebida tradicional de la región), cuenta con más de 05 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de materiales como calaminas, madera, entre otros, para el mejoramiento de su vivienda, en la cual esta ubicado su negocio. Esto le permitirá brindar una mejor atención a sus clientes, lo que se verá reflejado en mayores ingresos y por ende tendrá una mayor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Milagros is 26 years old.  She has a live-in relationship; she lives with her partner and her two children in the La Matanza district, Morropón province, Piura region, on the northern coast of Perú.  Life in that place is calm; the people mainly work in farming and ranching.

She works selling chicha (a traditional drink from that region).  She has more than five years’ experience in that business, and she has very good personal and professional references in that area.  Her loan will be used for the purchase of materials such as corrugated iron and wood, among others, in order to improve her home, where her business is located.  This will let her give her customers better service, which will in turn be reflected in better earnings and, in the end, a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy materials such as corrugated iron and wood, among others, to improve her home, where her business is located.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos tiene 35 años, es soltero, vive en la casa de sus padres en el distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La población de este distrito se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte en una mototaxi, cuenta con más de 4 años de experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El préstamo será utilizado para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento a su vehículo, ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado. Con esto Juan Carlos espera brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, lo que se verá reflejado en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 35 years old.  He is single and lives in his parents’ home in Pucará district, Jaén district, Cajamarca region, on the northern coast of Perú.  The people of this district work mainly in farming, ranching, and commerce.

He works offering transportation services in a mototaxi.  He has more than four years’ experience in this line of work and has very good personal and professional references in this district.  His loan will be used to make repairs and perform maintenance on his vehicle, because it is currently in a bad state of repair.  In this way, Juan Carlos hopes to give better service to his customers.  This will in turn be reflected in his level of income and, in the end, will improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to make repairs and perform maintenance on his vehicle, because currently it is in bad condition.

loans.name: Mylyn

texts.en:
Mylyn, 48, is married with eight children, three of whom are in school. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Mylyn runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years.

She has requested a loan of 16,000 Philippine pesos through the Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation. She will use the loan to buy additional items to sell, such as shampoo, noodles, sugar and canned goods.

Mylyn would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell, such as shampoo, noodles, sugar and canned goods.

loans.name: Tải

texts.en:
Mrs. Tải has a service business repairing bicycles. Tải has been involved in this business for five years.

Tải is 48 years old and she is married with two children. Tải and her business are in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Tải's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Tải faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Tải hopes for her business to do well, to build a new house, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos tiene 44 años de edad, es casado, vive junto a su esposa y sus cuatro hijos en casa propia en el distrito de Querocotillo, provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Las actividades principales que se desarrollan en el distrito son la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica al cultivo de café variedad Catimor, cuenta con más de 15 años de experiencia en esta actividad y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo lo utilizará como capital de trabajo, específicamente para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos y pago de jornales (peones agrícolas) para su cultivo. Esta inversión lo ayudará a tener mayor productividad en su negocio, generándole mayores ingresos y mejorando su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos is 44 years old.  He is married and lives together with his wife and their four children in their own home in the Querocotillo district, Cutervo province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Perú.  The jobs in this district are mainly in farming, ranching, and commerce.

He works cultivating coffee—the Catimor variety.  He has more than 15 years’ experience in this line of work and has very good personal and professional references from the area.  He will use the loan as working capital, specifically to buy fertilizers and soil amendments, and to pay day laborers (farm hands) for his crop.  This investment will help him to have better productivity from his business, generating more income for him and improving the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and soil amendments and to pay day laborers (farm hands) for his crop.

loans.name: Santos Agustin

texts.es:
Santos tiene 57 años de edad, es casado, vive con su cónyuge en casa propia en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, su población se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

El se dedica a prestar servicios como maestro en construcción, con 10 años de experiencia en el sector. Adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como patos, gallinas, pollos, entre otros. Cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de materiales como cemento, ladrillos, calaminas, entre otros, para el mejoramiento de su vivienda, lo que le permitirá gozar de mejores condiciones en su vivienda mejorando así su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Santos is 57 years old.  He is married and lives with his wife in their own home in the Cayaltí district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Perú.  Life in this district is calm; the people there work mainly in agriculture, ranching, and trade.

He works as a construction foreman, with ten years’ experience in this area.  Additionally, he works raising and selling small animals such as ducks, hens, and chicks, among others.  He has good personal and professional references from his district.  The loan will be used to buy materials such as cement, bricks, and corrugated iron, among others, to make improvements on his home.  This will let him enjoy better living conditions in his home, as well as improve the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy materials such as cement, bricks, and corrugated iron, among others, for the improvement of his home.

loans.name: Virgen De Los Angeles De Huayllacocha Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN DE LOS ANGELES DE HUAYLLACOCHA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Huarocondo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Silvia Marleny ella es casada y tiene 42 años y tiene 6 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta y crianza de animales, la socia cría los cuyes y gallinas los hace crecer y engordar y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias, por medio de este pequeño negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los cuyes y gallinas. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y gallinas y alimentos para los cuyes y gallinas.



Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de ganaderia, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de agricultura.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to Virgen de los Angeles de Huayllacocha Communal Bank, located in the district of Huarocondo in the province of Anta and department of Cusco.

The member is Silvia Marleny.  She's 42 years old and married, and she has six children.  She works in her business raising and selling animals.  She raises and fattens guinea pigs and chickens, then sells them in various markets.  She gets her family ahead with this small business.  Her dream is to have a retail space where she can sell the guinea pigs and chickens.

Silvia Marleny's requesting the loan to buy guinea pigs, chickens, and guinea pig and chicken feed.  She's grateful to those who are part of her dream through this means and she promises to make her payments punctually.

The businesses of the other members include animal sales, ranching, a grocery store, and farming.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs, chickens, and guinea pig and chicken feed

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is single and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell to her customers.

Merlinda has been in this business for 17 years now.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn is 39 years old and has four children. Roselyn is married and has two children who are currently in school.

She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.

Roselyn has been raising pigs for three years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Roselyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins, and other supplies for her pigs

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Hello, lenders! Meet Ahmad, one of Ruma's agents, who lives in North Bogor, a semi-urban city located about a two hours’ drive from Jakarta. Ahmad is married, and he and his wife are blessed with a three-year-old son. His wife is a full-time housewife. He is a micro entrepreneur who runs a small shop that sells mobile phone accessories and airtime credits and provides a utility bill payment service. 

About nine months ago, Ahmad decided to join Ruma because he wanted to improve his small shop through the use of mobile technology and his entrepreneurial skills. Ahmad says that doing mobile airtime business with Ruma has been really helpful because he is now able to save more money for his son’s education. 

Ahmad is known as a friendly and hardworking person in his community, and that is why people regularly come to his shop when they need to buy mobile phone airtime or pay utility bills. As his business continues, the number of mobile service transactions increases, and he needs more working capital to fill the demand. Therefore, he hopes to get a working-capital loan from Kiva to process such transactions in his community. 

In the photo, Ahmad is sitting in his small shop. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile services in his community

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy oil, potatoes, corn, bananas, etc.

loans.name: Pascuala

texts.es:
Pascuala tiene 51 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia junto a su cónyuge y sus 4 hijos en el distrito de La Matanza, provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en el distrito se desarrolla tranquilamente, sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y crianza de animales menores como patos, pavos, gallinas, entre otros.

Ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza y chicha de jora (bebida tradicional de la región). La actividad la realiza desde hace más de 5 años y cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El destino del crédito será para la compra de materiales de construcción como fierro, cemento y ladrillo para realizar mejoras en su vivienda. Con esto Pascuala espera mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, lo que le permitirá tener condiciones más cómodas para vivir y tendrá un gran impacto en su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Pascuala is 51 years old and is in a live-in relationship.  She lives in her own home, together with her partner and her four children.  They live in the La Matanza district, Morropón province, Piura region, on the northern coast of Perú.  Life in this district rolls by smoothly.  The people there work in agriculture, ranching, and raising small animals such as ducks, turkeys, and chickens, among others.

She works selling beer and “chicha de jora” (a traditional drink from the region).  She has been doing this for more than five years and has good personal and professional references in the area.  Her loan will be for the purchase of construction materials such as iron, cement, and brick to make improvements on her home.  In this way, Pascuala hopes to improve the condition of her home, which will allow her to have more comfortable living conditions and will have a huge impact on the quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as iron, cement, and brick, in order to make improvements on her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies and materials to help her calabash and bitter gourd crops.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is a 45-year-old married mother of seven children, five of whom are currently in school. A very hardworking entrepreneur, she has operated a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines for 12 years.

Teresa has requested a PHP 18000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials and gear for her business. In the future, she would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials and gear for her business

loans.name: Silvia Elena

texts.es: Silvia es una mujer de 60 años de edad que pone todo de su esfuerzo para sacar adelante a su familia, apoyada en su negocio de venta de comida actividad que realiza desde hace 7 años. Ella habita en vivienda propia desde hace 60 años, ya que es una herencia familiar, por lo que se siente feliz de tener un techo donde vivir. Silvia siempre busca la manera de mejorar sus ingresos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI que le permita invertir en: pollo, carne, pescado, arroz, verduras, legumbres, etc. Para preparar una mayor cantidad de comida que le permita cubrir la demanda de productos que solicitan sus clientes.
texts.en:
Silvia is a woman of 60 years old who puts all her effort into getting her family through, supporting them with her food sales business which she has had for 7 years. She has lived in her own home for 60 years, as it was a family inheritance, so she feels happy to have a roof over her head.

Silvia is always looking for a way to improve her income, so she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to purchase: chicken, meat, fish, rice, fruits and vegetables, etc. to make a greater quantity of food, which will enable her to meet the demand for products which her customers seek.

loans.use: to purchase: chicken, meat, fish, rice, fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José Luis tiene 44 años de edad, el es casado y cuenta con casa propia, allí vive con su esposa y sus hijos, ellos residen en el distrito de Cayalti, provincia de Chiclayo, en la región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La población del distrito se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

José Luis se dedica a prestar servicio de transporte público, el cuenta con 2 unidades de transporte, dos mototaxis (moto, con cabina para transportar personas). Esta actividad la realiza desde hace varios años. En este tiempo el ha adquirido clientela fija, y cuenta con experiencia en el rubro y muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para poder realizar un mantenimiento y reparaciones a sus dos unidades móviles (mototaxis), que actualmente se encuentran en mal estado.

José Luis es una persona muy trabajadora y el se esfuerza por salir adelante y que de esta manera su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida. Las personas que lo conocen lo consideran una persona amable y siempre dispuesta a ayudar a los demás.
texts.en:
Jose Luis is 44 years old, he is married, and he has his own home, where he lives with his wife and children. They live in the district of Cayalti, province of Chiclayo, in the region of Lambayeque, in the northern coast of Peru. The population of the district works primarily in agriculture, stock-breeding, and commerce. 
Jose Luis works in public transportation services. He has two vehicles, two motortaxis (a motorcycle with a cabin to transport people). He has had this occupation for several years now. In this time, he has acquired loyal clients, and he has experience in this field, and very good personal and work references in the area. The loan will be used to be able to do maintenance and repairs of his two vehicles (motortaxis) that are currently in bad shape. 
Jose Luis is a hard-working person, and he makes an effort to succeed, and that in this way, his family can have a better quality of life. People who know him consider him to be a kind person, and always ready to help others.

loans.use: to be able to do maintenance and repairs of his two vehicles (motortaxis) that are currently in bad shape.

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.en:
This is Candelaria. She sends you her thanks for your generosity because her previous loan has entrenched her business. She was able to buy more fish needed to increase her inventory. The loan also helped her provide for her family’s daily needs.

She is very positive that she could improve more her business if you will lend her an amount of 19,000 PHP. This new loan will go to additional fish she needs to improve her business. Her customers will likely buy more items if she has more of her products displayed in her store. An increase in sales will also result in a significant increase in profit, which will also result in her business becoming viable and sustainable. Simultaneously, she could sustain the needs of her family.

Candelaria wants to purchase a vehicle for transportation and for faster delivery of her products to be sold. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for more fish to be sold at the market.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
Santiago tiene 55 años de edad, vive con sus tres hijos, con casa propia, dedicado a la agricultura cultivando café. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio. Dicha comunidad está ubicada en el distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

Santiago se dedica al Cultivo de café, desde hace 10 años, en el caserio Ahuyaca. Santiago con el crédito invertirá en las labores de mantenimiento de su cultivo de café, dichas labores consisten en abonamientos, deshierbos, podas, entre otra, así como también invertirá en la compra de insumos para abonar su cultivo. Con esto el Santiago podra elevar sus rendimientos, lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Santiago, 55, lives with his three children in his own house.  He works in agriculture growing coffee.  His community--located in the district of Pucará in the province of Jaén in the Cajamarca region of the northern highlands of Peru--works primarily in agriculture, ranching, and commerce.  

Santiago has earned a living growing coffee in the community of Ahuyaca for 10 years.  He's going to invest the loan in maintenance tasks for his coffee crop: soil amendments, weeding, pruning, and other labor.  He's also going to buy agricultural inputs to fertilize his crop.

That way Santiago will be able to increase his yield, which will improve his income in the short term, increase his profits, and improve his quality of life and his family's as a result.

loans.use: to invest in tasks to maintain his coffee crop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of products such as rice, sugar, milk, and oil, for her store

loans.name: Mercy Amedalinda

texts.es:
Mercy tiene 39 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con sus 02 hijos en el distrito de Pomahuaca, provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Este es un distrito mediano en el cual la población se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, a la ganadería y al comercio.

Ella se dedica a la venta de calzado para damas, caballeros y niños, cuenta con mas de 02 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Por su experiencia cuenta con bastante clientela en el distrito. El destino del crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de calzado y ropa para aumentar el stock de su negocio, con esto Mercy espera poder satisfacer los gustos y preferencias de sus clientes, logrando obtener mayores ingresos lo que tendrá un gran impacto en su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Mercy is 39 years old.  She is a single mother who lives with her two children in the Pomahuaca district, Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Perú.  This is a medium-sized district where the people work mainly in agriculture, ranching, and commerce.

She works selling footwear for ladies, gentlemen, and children.  She has more than two years’ experience in this business and has very good personal and professional references from the area.  Due to her experience, she has a pretty good customer base in the district.  Her loan will be used to buy a greater quantity of footwear and clothing in order to expand her business’s stock.  In this way Mercy hopes to be able to satisfy the tastes and preferences of her customers, thus achieving greater profits.  This will have a big impact on her own quality of life, and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of footwear and clothing in order to increase her business' stock.
